name: Burg_475
culture_notes: Coastal Tongues dialect with Riveric loanwords
rituals tied to tides and ancestor offerings
constraints: No instant resurrection or true life-replacement magics
Ritual magic consumes scarce imported reagents or specialized labor
Long-range mind influence is rare and institutionally banned
notes: Navigational auguries used but do not replace charts or seamanship
Harbor exposed to seasonal gales; temporary shelter only
